title: Defect

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Channel** an orb, consuing it to activate an effect:
> **Lightning** — Roleblocks and Short-circuits 2 targets.
> **Frost** — All the coven gain basic defense, and their death is delayed by a day if they would be lynched tomorrow.
> **Dark** — Learn a target's role, visits and feedback from each night.
> **Plasma** — Use an ability from any coven role that doesn't kill or give a free win.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with 2 empty orb slots.
- You gain a random orb each night start: **Lightning**, **Frost**, **Dark**, **Plasma**. If you would get one while you already have 2, your oldest orb is **Channelled** tonight as a free action.
- While you have unused orbs, the holder of the necronomicon gains passive boosts:
> **Lightning** — Roleblocks players they attack.
> **Frost** — Gains basic defense, if they already have defense, they learn the name of attackers on them instead.
> **Dark** — Visits are now astral.
> **Plasma** — Visits cannot be roleblocked, redirected, interrupted or fail in any way.
